name: KIconEdit
description: KIconEdit is an icon editing software. Its functions include common drawing tools, color picker, undo/redo, custom templates and icon size, bitmap format reading and saving, etc.

en_US.description: KIconEdit is an icon editing software. Its functions include common drawing tools, color picker, undo/redo, custom templates and icon size, bitmap format reading and saving, etc.
en_US.name: KIconEdit

zh_CN.description: KIconEdit是一款图标编辑软件，它包括常用绘图工具、颜色选择器、撤销 / 重做、自定义模板和图标大小、读取和保存位图格式等功能。
zh_CN.name: KIconEdit
